scripts.install: cd ./micro-frontend-nextjs-header && yarn install && cd ../micro-frontend-nextjs-content && yarn install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd micro-frontend-nextjs-header; yarn dev" "cd micro-frontend-nextjs-content; yarn dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd micro-frontend-nextjs-header; yarn start" "cd micro-frontend-nextjs-content; yarn start"
scripts.build: cd ./micro-frontend-nextjs-header && yarn build && cd ../micro-frontend-nextjs-content && yarn build
